alert.note: Alert for Harney County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:58PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Harney County through 530 PM PDT... At 457 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sagehen Hill, or 15 miles west of Burns, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sagehen Hill around 500 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
